name: Flik - Big Mix Diversity 48H Game Jam
name_original: Flik - Big Mix Diversity 48H Game Jam
description: The game FLIK consists of a character named Flik who has to go through three cities on his journey.  Each city has a different condition so that it has to choose what is the best way to interact in each environment, thus finding out more, being able to accept and change or maintain its shape.
